text: *Creak... whirr...*
Strange, unpleasant noises reverberated from the body of Faust, the mechanical woman.

name: Faust
text: Ugh...

name: Sakura
text: We've beaten your underlings! All that's left is you! Miss "I like acting like a robot"!!
Faust's subordinates had been skilled, but even they had fallen before Sakura's Shadow Jutsu one by one.

name: Faust's Subordinate
text: Faust-sama... her shadow... ugh...

name: Faust
text: ーーーーーー!
Faust was quick to make a decision when she saw that she was at a decisive disadvantage.

name: Me
text: Huh!?!
Faust soared into the air while dropping a large amount of hand grenades on the ground, like they were gushing out of her body.

name: Me
text: For real!? ーEverybody get doooooown!!
*BOOOOOM*...!
Smoke billowed up with a roar.

name: Me
text: (Shit! I can't see anything...!)

name: Sakura
text: Heeey! Everybody still alive~?

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah, somehow... And Faust... got away, huh.
Faust was already nowhere to be seen. The grenades had had little to no killing power and were basically just a smokescreen to obscure our view.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Man, we were in a rough spot there, but thanks to you we escaped with our lives! Gyahahaha!!

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Anyway girl, I had no idea you were a Taimanin!!

name: Sakura
text: Ehehe, guess it was bound to be found out~ Yeah, actually I am.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: No wonder you're strong!! I was totally bamboozled! Gyahahaha!

name: Sakura
text: Yuuup, the beautiful and strong Sakura-chan! That's what they say...? About me.

name: Me
text: (Is that so?)

name: Orc Mercenary
text: A girl with a strong will and body! Good, good, I'd love to get married to a Taimanin just like you, Sakura-chan! Gyahahaha!

name: Sakura
text: What the~! Ahahaha! You say the weirdest things!
I didn't really get it, but the Orc and Sakura were laughing and getting along well.

name: Me
text: Sheesh, it's nice that you guys are hitting it off, but it's gonna be trouble to hang around here too long.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Oho, you're right! We had a crazy battle in a place like this, imagine what would happen if a Taimanin squad came.

name: Me
text: That's true, but there's also a high chance that we'll be attacked by the UFS again. They must've figured out our location by now.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: True. We'll get out of here then.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: We ended up working for free, but we were saved thanks to you!

name: Me
text: Thanks to you as well. Bye then, and don't do anything to get yourself wiped out by Taimanin.

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Guhaha! I won't screw up that badly. You guys take care!

name: Orc Mercenary
text: ーOh, hey kid.

name: Me
text: Hm?

name: Orc Mercenary
text: Your physical strength is somewhat lacking, but you'll make a good commander. Contact us if you're ever doing work on the dark side.
The Orc said and left with a wink that didn't suit his face.

name: Me
text: Uh, um... thanks, I guess.

name: Me
text: (Getting complimented by that Orc dude is somehow not very appealing...)

name: Sakura
text: Phew! I guess that's it! Let's go home as well, Fuma-kun!

name: Me
text: Before that, what do we do with the "cargo"...? It'd be tricky for the two of us to carry, but we also can't just leave it here...
I pondered over the left behind "cargo."

name: Sakura
text: Ahhh~!!

name: Me
text: Wh-What the hell was that about!?

name: Sakura
text: We worked for free too, didn't we!!

name: Me
text: Oh right, yeah. I guess it can't be helped this time. If it's about the money I lent you, you can pay that back whenever you want.

name: Sakura
text: More importantly, our fancy dinner! Hey hey hey, would it be bad if we sold that off?

name: Me
text: You think it would be good!?

name: Sakura
text: Ugh, but~... *sigh*... our fancy dinner...
Sakura was hanging her head, but this time we should consider simply escaping with our lives a good thing.

name: Me
text: (Right, there's no such thing as a juicy part-time job.)
To be honest, I also had been looking forward just a bit... no, more like quite a bit... to safely finishing this job and getting paid.

name: Me
text: (I guess I'll still be living on a shoestring for the foreseeable future. Sheesh...)
Meanwhile.
Tsubaki, the mercenary, was walking through the nighttime red-light district.
She was a former Taimanin. Due to certain circumstances, she had gone rogue.
Since then she had been working freelance as a mercenary. Her clients included demons and members of the underworld. The convoy mission this time had been another job like that as well.
The client was a man with deep ties to the criminal organization Nomad.
Tsubaki entered a nightclub. A waiter led her to the booth where the client was waiting.

name: Tsubaki
text: It's me. I brought the goods.
The "client" took a look at Tsubaki and nodded gravely. Though in the dim light his expression could barely be seen.

name: Client
text: Good work. ...What about your partner, that mechanical woman?

name: Tsubaki
text: The plan is to rendezvous later.

name: Client
text: By the looks of it, everything went splendidly.

name: Tsubaki
text: Splendidly... I guess. They took the "bait," just as planned.

name: Client
text: The "bait"... you mean that junk you stole from the UFS?

name: Tsubaki
text: Yes. Thanks to us recruiting mercenaries around town and making a big show of guarding it as we transported it, the UFS was focused solely on that.

name: Client
text: Meaning in the meantime you were able to easily slip out with the goods.

name: Tsubaki
text: Exactly.

name: Client
text: And the mercenaries are disposable, huh. Hehe... another of your cruel schemes.

name: Tsubaki
text: That's what mercenaries are for. The weak will be exploited, and only the strong line their pockets.

name: Client
text: That's true. So what about the goods?
Tsubaki placed the box she had brought onto the table.
Among the things stolen from the UFS research facility, the apparent drone innards were merely junk. What the "client" was really after was this item.

name: Client
text: Good.

name: Tsubaki
text: Are you not going to check the contents... Nisha Gaiza?

name: Nisha Gaiza
text: No need. I can trust your work.
The "client" was Nisha Gaiza.
He twisted his lips into a smirk as he looked at the "promised goods."
The necessary parts were assembled. All that remained was to execute the planー
